org.descripter.js.api

Class Internalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.descripter.js.api.Context<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer,Internalizer>
      • org.descripter.js.api.Internalizer

  • public final class Internalizer
extends Context<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer,Internalizer>

    Contextually manages the map from the external strings to the internal indices.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.descripter.org

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Global<? extends Core> go
      The Global context this Internalizer is in charge of.

      • get

        public final java.lang.Integer get(java.lang.String key)

        Returns the internal Integer index associated with the specified external String key.

        Overrides:
        get in class Context<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer,Internalizer>
        Parameters:
        key - An external String key to lookup
        Returns:
        The internal Integer index associated with the specified external String key or null for none.
        Since:
        1.0

      • put

        public final void put(java.lang.String k,
       java.lang.Integer i)

        Sets the internal Integer index associated with the specified external String key.

        This method calls the super method to set the mapping. It also sets the corresponding reverse lookup to the xt.

        Overrides:
        put in class Context<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer,Internalizer>
        Parameters:
        k - An external String key to set
        i - An internal Integer index to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the current context is read-only.
        Since:
        1.0
